definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
to stand side by side/variant of 眾|众[zhong4]
to condense/to coagulate/coacervation (i.e. form tiny droplets)/aggregation/coherent
to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
communal meal/formal dinner of club or group

sentences.english: In this paper, asymmetric microporous poly (vinylidene fluoride) (PVDF)membranes were prepared by phase-inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用相轉換法制備了聚偏氟乙烯不對稱微孔膜。

sentences.english: Using sorbitol as a substitute for polyglycerin to make an industrial deformer was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 試驗了用山梨醇取代聚甘油制工業用消泡劑的可能性。

sentences.english: Meso - carbon microbeads (MCMBs) were prepared from coal tar pitch by condensation.
sentences.chinese: 以煤瀝青爲原料，採用熱縮聚法制備中間相炭微球。

sentences.english: Conclusion Polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis technology can be used for seed identification of Andrographis paniculata seeds.
sentences.chinese: 結論聚丙烯酰胺凝膠電泳手藝可用於穿心蓮種子剖斷。

sentences.english: It is revealed that hydroxyl content was also the key factor to q m of porous PS microspheres.
sentences.chinese: 羥基含量也是影響聚蔗糖多孔微球吸附量的主導因素。

sentences.english: Mineral filled, toughened, lubricated polybutylene terephthalate resin for injection molding. It has exceptaional surface aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 礦物填充，增韌，潤滑聚對苯二甲酸丁二酯樹脂注塑。

sentences.english: That year, we have met, but poly endless period.
sentences.chinese: 那年，我們曾相遇，可是聚無盡期。

sentences.english: Unreinforced, Super Tough polybutylene terephthalate resin for injection molding.
sentences.chinese: 注坯模型的未加強，超級堅韌聚丁烯對苯二酸鹽樹脂。

sentences.english: Don't put the ads will shorten to not stood on tiptoe can see the place.
sentences.chinese: 不要把聚光點縮短到不踮起腳尖就可以看到的地方。

sentences.english: The front housing is made of polycarbonate and the rear housing is made of reinforced unsaturated resins.
sentences.chinese: 前罩殼爲聚炭酸醋，後罩殼爲增強不飽和樹酯。

sentences.english: Polysiloxane emulsions were prepared through emulsion ionic ring-opening polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 採用乳液離子開環聚合手段製備了聚有機硅氧烷乳液。

sentences.english: The children gathered in the garden to set the fireworks off.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們聚在花園裏放煙火。

sentences.english: Villagers gather outside a house whose walls cracked from an earthquake in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal.
sentences.chinese: 地震過後，村民們聚在一所遭損傷房屋的窗外。

sentences.english: The synthesis and application of cationic polyelectrolyte with high density charge.
sentences.chinese: 高密度電荷陽離子聚電解質的製備及應用。

sentences.english: The polyacrylate nano-particle has been prepared by use of emulsion polymerization technology.
sentences.chinese: 通過乳液聚合，製備了聚丙烯酸酯納米粒子。

sentences.english: At high external field, the polyampholyte chain is more extended.
sentences.chinese: 電場強度較高時，兩性聚離子鏈構型更爲舒展。
